name: Africa Public Private Partnership
content: The 13th edition of Africa PPP will take place in October 2023 in Morocco. We are very pleased to have Morocco as the Host Partner of Choice for this edition. The event will comprise certified training on PPP and a 2-day conference. It will feature active and upcoming projects in renewable energy, waste to energy, wastewater, bulk water, bulk transport and infrastructure and spotlight new projects in social service PPPâ€™s.
